channel.title: Frozn Tyme [we need advertisers ]
channel.description:
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2z6dn4n.jpg[/img]
[b][size=12pt]we have webclient Our website is here[url=http://frozntyme.x10.mx/]http://frozntyme.x10.mx/ [/url]Permission from Taharok if u would like to see a picture ill post one thank you [/size][/b]
[size=12pt]we are hosted on a vps so if u wont to join the server u can just post can i have the link and ill pm u it or pm me thank u [/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JYEqqZ92ZO0[/youtube]
this is what the server use too look like [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E2uLU9ef6JA&feature=player_embedded[/youtube]
player own shop [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture137.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture135.png[/img] DUNGEONEERING :p BOSSES [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv251stdungboss.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv252nddungboss.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv253rddungboss.jpg[/img] WE ADDED DUNG TO GO TO 120 BUT WE HAVE NOT ADDED 602 SKILL TAB YET SO DUNG IS ON THE QUEST TAB AND WE ADDED KINGLY_IMPLING [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture130.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture129.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture128.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture116.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture117.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture118.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture119.png[/img] new dungoneering interface it 100% work when u open the shop up [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture115.png[/img] new update added this when u start we just need 2 add to it when u click it u get the Armour u pick so range/magic/meele [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture114.png[/img] Working hand cannon got added yesterday Thank's Matthew [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture100.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture110.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture109.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture107.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture103.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture102.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture101.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture112.png[/img] item.title: Frozn Tyme [we need advertisers ]
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“Hot_Potato, post:153, topic:412660”][quote author=liamp link=topic=514138.msg3752633#msg3752633 date=1316151497]

If you want to learn Java that bad, quit this shit leached server and actually download eclipse or shit and make stuff from that. Nobody can troll or hate for you on that.

You mean leach.

the only thing that is leeched on here is the client the source is not a leech open ur eyes maybe

How can you even code if you got no grammar? There’s nothing you can really add to PI, so why bother with a PI?

because we like pi idc if u say o well i like what ever base we like it

Why do you like PI? Conventions? Packaging? Stability? Efficiency? Uniqueness? Please answer.

i like pi because it was the first base i learnt how to code on didn’t start on delta nothing like that started on pi
[/quote]
Typo - it was how to leach not how to code.[/quote]
ok well get back on track im back now and can we talk about the server not about random stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Frozn Tyme [we need advertisers ]
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:126, topic:412660”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=514138.msg3750028#msg3750028 date=1315959100]

I see tuts. This wont go far at all.

People don’t learn from tutorials copy + pasting.

yes u do learn from tutorials

Please, tell me what you have learned from looking at tutorials.

I’m sorry not everyone is not as good as you at coding… but you’re not the best but from what you and everyone else who have posted negative comments, you’re nothing, there are many, many, way better coders than you. So before you post negative comments about how shitty of a coder I am and I only follow tutorials, become the best… Make another RuneScape… Oh wait… you can’t. How do you think people start off? They learn from others, from tutorials. What do you think school is? You’re learning from others. Does the word “teacher” mean nothing to you?

When did I say you were a poor coder? I asked if you could post something that you have learned from a tutorial. I know I’m not the greatest coder in the history of the world, no shit. I learned from reading code, I didn’t C+P a tut, rename a server, and then post a development thread about (4 times this has been posted btw). If I did Copy and Paste a tut and I planned on releasing that source I would put an @author tag so credits would be given.
[/quote]

I didn’t just copy and paste, i also read the codes, and I haven’t been making the threads, I’m not on Moparscape that much but since this thread started, I have been. But almost every comment from anyone has been negative about how “this will not go far”… Well, once again, i’m sorry i’m not the best at coding, no one is, because it just keeps getting more, and more advanced. But at least don’t post negative comments, of course it won’t go far if everyone is dis’in it because then people who view this will think it’s shit as well.[/quote]
yeah ur not the best but ur still the one who coded this even if u used tut who cares

Read full topic

item.title: Frozn Tyme [we need advertisers ]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:139, topic:412660”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=514138.msg3750208#msg3750208 date=1315963556]

I’m sorry not everyone is not as good as you at coding… but you’re not the best but from what you and everyone else who have posted negative comments, you’re nothing, there are many, many, way better coders than you. So before you post negative comments about how shitty of a coder I am and I only follow tutorials, become the best… Make another RuneScape… Oh wait… you can’t. How do you think people start off? They learn from others, from tutorials. What do you think school is? You’re learning from others. Does the word “teacher” mean nothing to you?

wtf is coding. Somebody could make another Runescape, but it takes a loot of time, dedication, and a huge team of programmers. There’s no point if there is one already. Don’t follow tutorials. Make shit up, and just add it; learn by looking at the codes from dumb ass Sanity.

No one making a RuneScape Private Server can ever match up to Jagex Ltd.
[/quote]
lololololol. Of course anybody can do it, it just takes time.[/quote]

Okay, you get a team and do it, make a second RuneScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Frozn Tyme [we need advertisers ]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:135, topic:412660”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=514138.msg3750177#msg3750177 date=1315962647]

I didn’t just copy and paste, i also read the codes, and I haven’t been making the threads, I’m not on Moparscape that much but since this thread started, I have been. But almost every comment from anyone has been negative about how “this will not go far”… Well, once again, i’m sorry i’m not the best at coding, no one is, because it just keeps getting more, and more advanced. But at least don’t post negative comments, of course it won’t go far if everyone is dis’in it because then people who view this will think it’s shit as well.

Yeah well maybe you should create something on your own. You must’ve learned something from the tutorials you have added. Why not try to make something yourself now? Maybe people saying “Don’t see this going far because all I see is tuts” is a hint for you to get creative and do something that isn’t in a tutorial.

I have, I made an acheivement system where you get points when you click it, not like the one from google.com. I made Dungeoneering with 3 dungeons, planning on making more, just need to find maps that are long/confusing to get through. Those are the big ones for now. Also little things like Air PvP, took like 5 minutes to make it though :p.

The problem with all those things is, they have been done before. Think long and hard (hehe) about something new you put on your PI.

I can’t think of much more to add, I look in the show off sections on google.com, but nothing appeals to my eyes for it to be made.

I didn’t just copy and paste, i also read the codes, and I haven’t been making the threads, I’m not on Moparscape that much but since this thread started, I have been. But almost every comment from anyone has been negative about how “this will not go far”… Well, once again, i’m sorry i’m not the best at coding, no one is, because it just keeps getting more, and more advanced. But at least don’t post negative comments, of course it won’t go far if everyone is dis’in it because then people who view this will think it’s shit as well.

Yeah well maybe you should create something on your own. You must’ve learned something from the tutorials you have added. Why not try to make something yourself now? Maybe people saying “Don’t see this going far because all I see is tuts” is a hint for you to get creative and do something that isn’t in a tutorial.

I have, I made an acheivement system where you get points when you click it, not like the one from google.com. I made Dungeoneering with 3 dungeons, planning on making more, just need to find maps that are long/confusing to get through. Those are the big ones for now. Also little things like Air PvP, took like 5 minutes to make it though :p.

Congratz you’ve learned how to rip.

BTW PI is for noobs!!

I didn’t rip dungeoneering or achievement system from any server. And you obviously haven’t read like my past 2 or 3 comments…

Tbh I couldn’t give a shit about your past 2 or 3 comments. This server is full of tuts and prolly won’t go too far ( as said many times)

I’m done with you, just going to ignore you, don’t bother posting anything on this thread anymore.
[/quote]

LOL K, wasn’t I in this thread longer then you? Plus you’re not OP.[/quote]

Hmm… well saying it’s the server I’ve been coding… And you don’t know what a tutorial means, google it and see the definition.

Read full topic

But at least don’t post negative comments, of course it won’t go far if everyone is dis’in it because then people who view this will think it’s shit as well.

Yeah well maybe you should create something on your own. You must’ve learned something from the tutorials you have added. Why not try to make something yourself now? Maybe people saying “Don’t see this going far because all I see is tuts” is a hint for you to get creative and do something that isn’t in a tutorial.

I have, I made an acheivement system where you get points when you click it, not like the one from google.com. I made Dungeoneering with 3 dungeons, planning on making more, just need to find maps that are long/confusing to get through. Those are the big ones for now. Also little things like Air PvP, took like 5 minutes to make it though :p.

Congratz you’ve learned how to rip.

BTW PI is for noobs!!

I didn’t rip dungeoneering or achievement system from any server. And you obviously haven’t read like my past 2 or 3 comments…
[/quote]

Tbh I couldn’t give a shit about your past 2 or 3 comments. This server is full of tuts and prolly won’t go too far ( as said many times)[/quote]

I’m done with you, just going to ignore you, don’t bother posting anything on this thread anymore. Btw, you obviously have no friends in real life if you act like this.

Read full topic
